page.title: 16Minshull Vernon
page.content: Minshull Vernon is a small hamlet rath er than a village.It has a long histor y,being mentioned in the original Dome sday Book whereas Warmingham is not.Ho wever,it is now much smaller than Warm ingham and lacks the unifying factors such as a school,church or village hal l.The only centre for the people to meet is the Verdin Arms,the local pub. There are three small firms operating from the hamlet and a transport cafe serving the traffic using the A530.The firms are fairly recent and the cafe has only been open for a short time.Th e social life of the inhabitants is conducted in the main outside the ham let in Middlewich,Church Minshull and Bradfield Green.
